attributes.action: Ensure better medical support for our service personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our service personnel, who suffer trauma and injury in the line of duty, do not receive the priority specialist support they deserve. This has recently been highlighted in the news and it is a disgrace that in this day and age, despite the horrors we expect our personnel to both live through and observe, appropriate counselling and medical support is not given. This should be a primary expenditure for both serving and discharged personnel.

The current and planned facilities at the military wing of Birmingham Hospital are not adequate if our political leaders continue to deploy our forces in military conflicts world wide. Therefore, whether the budget is found from within the NHS, the MOD or the contingency fund, additional resources, preferably located at multi-points of delivery, should be found.
